alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lamoille (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 9:28PM EDT until August 12 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LAMOILLE AND SOUTH CENTRAL FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 927 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Westford, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Waterville, Jeffersonville Village, Cambridge, Cambridge Village, Fletcher, Johnson, Fairfax, Fairfield, Bakersfield, Jeffersonville, East Fletcher, East Fairfield, Binghamville, West Fletcher, North Cambridge, Cambridge Junction, South Cambridge, and Pleasant Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
